meanings: (떨어지지 않게) stick, attach, (formal) affix, (풀로) paste, glue
(속담) Many go out for wool and come home shorn.

vlive.korean: [소원성취] 아 (센터 스티커) 드디어 붙였다! [My wish came true] Oh, finally, I got this sticker! 듣기 View video Mnet : 프로듀스101 시즌2 9화
vlive.english: [My wish came true] Oh, finally, I got this sticker!

vlive.korean: 근데 붙였다 뗄 수 있는 거지? You can stick them together and take them apart, right? 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [Special] 너나해 '음주 歌 마무' 시즌 2
vlive.english: You can stick them together and take them apart, right?

vlive.korean: 처음에는 의미가 없었는데 의미를 붙였다. - 그렇죠. There was no meaning at first, but you gave it one. - Right. 듣기 View video JYPnation : 박지민 COMEBACK LIVE TALK
vlive.english: There was no meaning at first, but you gave it one. - Right.

vlive.korean: 밴드 붙였다. I put a bandage on my thumb. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 리막 뭐하게 ?!
vlive.english: I put a bandage on my thumb.

vlive.korean: 붙였다 뗐다 하는 것 같아요. It's like it's on and off. 듣기 View video Show! Music core : 쇼! 음악중심 '5분 딜레이~' Show! Music core
vlive.english: It's like it's on and off.

examples.korean: She glued the label onto the box. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 상자에 라벨을 붙였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She glued the label onto the box. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He put name tags on all his shirts. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 자기 셔츠 모두에 이름표를 붙였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He put name tags on all his shirts. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He pasted the pictures into his scrapbook. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그 사진들을 자기 스크랩북에 풀로 붙였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He pasted the pictures into his scrapbook. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He grabbed her arms and pinned them to her sides. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 그녀의 두 팔을 잡아 꼼짝 못하게 옆구리에 갖다 붙였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He grabbed her arms and pinned them to her sides. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She lit a candle. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 양초에 불을 붙였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She lit a candle. Add to Wordbook
